article: Once upon a time there was a child ready to be born. One day the child asked God, "They tell me you are going to send me to the _ tomorrow but how am I going to _ there being so small and helpless?" God replied. "Among the many _ , I have chosen one for you. She will be waiting for you and will take care of you."  "But tell me, here in Heaven, I don't do _ else but sing and smile. That's _ I need to be happy!"  "Your angel will sing for you and will also _ for you every day. And you will feel your angel's love and be _ ."  "And how am I going to be able to _ when people talk to me, if I don't know the language they speak?"  "That's easy," said God. "Your angel will tell you the most beautiful words you will _ hear, and with much patience and _ , your angel will teach you how to _ ."  "I've heard on the earth there are _ men. Who will protect me?"  God put his arm around the child, saying, "Your angel will _ you, even if it means _ her life!"  "But I will always be sad _ I will not see you any more."  God hugged the child, "Your angel will _ talk to you about me."  At that moment there was much peace in Heaven, but voices from the earth could already be _ . The child knew he had to start on his _ very soon, and he asked God one more question, "Oh God, since I am about to leave now, please tell me my Angel's name!"  God replied, "Your angel's name is not _ to remember. You will simply call her Mommy!"
